title: Christmas faces (Android Wear)
summary: The Holiday Season is Upon Us! Be festive with beautiful Android Wear watchfaces
developerAddress:
115 Conistone Way,
N7 9DE
London
United Kingdom
description: Select one of the many Christmas themed Android Wear watchfaces. Features:- The watchfaces runs on any Android Wear watch- A lot of free Christmas faces are included- Selecting a watchface is simple.- Advent calendarThe watchfaces are being customly made and are updated frequently
descriptionHTML:
Select one of the many Christmas themed Android Wear watchfaces.

Features:

- The watchfaces runs on any Android Wear watch
- A lot of free Christmas faces are included
- Selecting a watchface is simple.
- Advent calendar

The watchfaces are being customly made and are updated frequently
comments: Nice, but small Can't it fill my square watch face? It's a shame there's such a large, and wasted, border.
Nice watched faces! Can you make them compatible with round faces?  Some of the content is cut off on my watch.
no settings useless, stays on for a few seconds then goes into non-xmas mode. settings tab has no useful settings
Awesome Awesome but fix the am/pm issue 12pm showing as Am. No difference
very nice great looking watch face
Hideous watch faces Don't work well on round watches. Most faces have to be bought separately too!
recentChanges: Holiday season is upon us. Be festive with watchfaces for Android Wear
